pullrequest.title: Changes to the structure of the DDS device class for the implementation of labscript_devices pull request 62.

content.raw: Note that this hasn’t been tested on anything other than a basic single pulseblaster experiment. Can you check that it all works as expected in your lab? \(you shouldn’t need to use the PulseBlasterDDS class, as it should all be backwards compatible\)
content.html: Note that this hasn’t been tested on anything other than a basic single pulseblaster experiment. Can you check that it all works as expected in your lab? (you shouldn’t need to use the PulseBlasterDDS class, as it should all be backwards compatible)
